== Snappy ==

Welcome to the Snappy namespace on the wiki. Here we organise the team's activities and plan activities together. If you want to get involved: great! We're always looking for help!

=== Documentation ===

If you are new to snappy, you might want to have a look at the following docs:

* <nowiki>[[https://developer.ubuntu.com/snappy/|General introduction to Snappy]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://developer.ubuntu.com/snappy/start/|Get started with Snappy]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://developer.ubuntu.com/snappy/guides/|Guides to Snappy]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[SnappyHackerUsefulLinkCollection|Snappy Hacker Useful Link Collection]]</nowiki>

Can't find your answer in the documentation? Ask your question on <nowiki>[[http://askubuntu.com/questions/tagged/ubuntu-core|Ask Ubuntu]]</nowiki>.

=== Activities ===

Prior to releases we have our <nowiki>[[OpenHouses|Snappy Open House]]</nowiki> event. They are a great way to get involved.

=== Stay in touch ===
Find us on:

* <nowiki>[[http://webchat.freenode.net/?channels=snappy|#snappy on irc.freenode.net]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/mailman/listinfo/snapcraft|snapcraft mailing list]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://lists.snapcraft.io/mailman/listinfo/devices|devices mailing list]]</nowiki>
